name: Thunder Gulch
description: Thunder Gulch captured the 1995 Kentucky Derby  as a 24-1 longshot over two favored stablemates and later won the Belmont Stakes en route to champion three-year-old honors. In addition to his two classic wins, Thunder Gulch also won the Florida Derby, Travers, Fountain of Youth, Swaps, and Kentucky Cup Classic in 1995. As a two-year-old, he captured the Remsen.
